

Kur‘aan Kronkron no ye Onyankopon asem na eye yikyere a Onyankopon yi
de maa Islam Komhyeni Kronkron Muhammad (Onyankopon asomdwoee
ne Ne nhyira nka no), a emu asemfua biara ye Onyankopon asem. Saa
yikyere no Onyankopon kos so de maa no wd mfiec aduonu mmiensa mu.
Nsempa nyinaa mu, Kur‘aan Kronkron nkoaa na egye ma ne ho se emu
asemfua biara ye Onyankopon yikyere nkoaa. Wei ye Muslimfoo nwoma
kronkron a kwan-kyere a ewie emu-die wo.

€Ennye Muslimfos nkoaa na kwankyere no wo ho ma won, mmom ews hs ma
nnipa nkace no nso afe bs3. Onyankopon ahye bs se ODbebs emu nsem no ho
ban mmere nyinaa mu. €no nti na nsesaee anaase nsakraee biara mmaa
Arabek atwerensem a Onyankopon dii kan de maaee no mu da no. Arabek
atwerensem no ye pepeepe nn_e sedee woyi kyeree Muhammad (Onyankopon
asomdwoce ne Ne nhyira nka no) mfie apem ahanan ne ne mmoroce a atwam
kd no ara.

Onyankopon Asem Kronkron no asekyere nnye adwuma a eye mmere koraa.
Ewiase nyinaa Ahmadiyya Muslim Kuo afa ato won ho so se eye won asodie se
wobekyere Kur‘aan Kronkron no ase frenkyemm ws nokore mu aks ewiase
kasa horod mu, ama wode asomasem no aduru Nnipa ahoros hs wo won
ankasa kasa horod mu. Saa Asante nkyereasee yi a Owura Yusuf Ahmad
Edusei aye yi, wokyeree asee firii Enyiresi Nkyereasee a Ahmadiyyafos
Nwoma-nimfos Baanodifos ahoros bi kyeree asee firii Arabek kasa-tene no
mu. Saa Baanodifoo no nso de won adwuma no totoo Maulawi Sher Ali
Enyiresi nkyereasee no ho. Saa Asante nkyereasce yi nso yede nkyereasce
nsesamu a ecfiri Ahmadiyya Muslim Kuo Nnaanofod Dpunpuni Hadhrat
Mirza Tahir Ahmad hd no ahye mu. Yehyee dwumadie yi ase wo saa
Nnaanofos yi a sye Bohye Messia, Ahmadiyya Muslim Kuo no Farebae no
Odiadeni a dt) so Nnan no mmere so. Na yewiee dwumadie no nyinaa wo
seisei Ahmaddiyya Muslim Kuo no Nnaanofo> Opunpuni Hadhrat Mirza
Masroor Ahmad a dye Bohye Messia no Odiadeni a std so Nnum no
akwankcre ne n‘ahyesem so.

Edii mfie bebiree ansaana worewie nkyereasee no, efirise na ehia mmere ne
mmddenbs pii. Yesre Allah se sma Owura Edusei ne n‘aboafos nyinaa
akatua a edi mu paa enam saa 9som-pa kesee yi nti na Yesre Allah se Onhwie
Ne nhyira a woasam ayie ngu wonom a woboaa saa nkycreasee dwumadie yi

nyinaa so. Amen.Owura Munir-ud-Din Shams a dye Wakil-ul-Tasneef Mfoasos no kd so
kyeree nkyereasefod no kwan de ahyesem ne kwankyere a efiri Hadhrat
Khalifatul Masih a std so Nnan ne Nnum hd maa nkyereasefos no na dseee
donhwere bebiree nso ne nkyereasefos no tenaa ase de Enyiresi nkyereasee no
totoo Asante nkyereasee no ho.

Arabek atwerensem no nso, Mirza Anas Ahmad, Wakil-ul-Isha‘at na shwee
sO maa wode tetaree Asante nkyereasee no anim wo Rabwah, Pakistan,
Maulvi A. Wahab Adam a dye Ameer ne Osofopon a dda Ahmadiyya Muslim
Kuo no ano wo Ghana na shwee so na dhyee nkyereasefod no nkuran maa
Wwowiee dwumadie no. Owura Abada Barbouche a dws London nso na dyee
ntemdifoos maa kompiuta dwumadie a efirii Ghana k39 Rabwah, Pakistan no.
Yesre Allah se Oma wonom a woboaa saa nkyereasee dwumadie yi firi
n‘ahyease kopem se wotintimiie wieee no nyinaa akatua a edi mu paa. Amen

Yesre Allah se Onye saa nkyereasee yi kwankyere ti ma nkurofoo a wote

Asante kasa no ase na Omue won akoma mu ma Kur‘aan Kronkron no
asomasem nwanwasod no. Amen.

Nwoma-yofoo no.NEA OKYEREE ASEE

ASEM TIAA BI

ONYANKOPON: Tweaduampon, Otumfoo, Dboo-adee no, ne din Nyankopon
no nni dodos kabea wo Asante kasa mu. Ewo mu se Akunini a wokyeree Bible
ase koo Akan kasa mu no de ‘anyame’ hyee won nkyereasee mu dee nanso ennye
kasa a wotac ka no wo kasa ferenkyem mu. Mmom ‘abosom’ na yetac ka. Efirise
edin Onyankopon no ankasa kycre ne ho ase se: Onyame a Oye Baako na Oye
Kese. €nam saa nti, yede kasa ‘asomnnee’ agyina ho ama abodee ahoroo a
ebinom som nyinaa wo saa nkyereasee yi mu.

ASANTE KASA GU AHOROD: Asante Kasa gu ahoroo bebiree na eko so
danedane firi bea bi so ko bea bi so. €nam afutufra a yeadie wo y’abakosem mu
nti, ene se yenni atwerensem a edooso na eboaboa kasa no nyinaa ano nti ema
nkycreasce no ye den paa ara yic. Yepe se okcenkanfoo no hye no nsow se yede
kasafua “yo” agyina ho ama adeyo anaase nkekaho adwumayos nyinaa na yede
kasafua “ye” agyina ho ama tebea anaa suban nkyeremu nyinaa. Mfatoho: “wayo
papa bebiree, oye nipa papa”.

ADWUMA A DYOFOD DIN AMMA: Akan kasa si no pi se ewo se dwumadie
biara nya syofos. Enti dee enni syofoo no Akuapimfoo ne Mfantefoo de edin-nsi-
ananmu ‘wo’ gyina ho na Asantefoo nso de ‘ye’ gyina ho ma dwumadie no. Te se
‘Krataa a woakyerew’ (Akuapim) ‘Kratae a woatwerew’ (Mfante) ‘Krataa a
yeatwere’ (Asante). Se Onyankopon kasa ma Ne ho wo Kur’aan Kronkron mu a
tae de dodoo kabea na eka. Te se: “Yen na Yede Nwoma no asoma wo’. Sedee
ebeye na okenkanfoo no adwene mu nnye no nnaa nti yede edin-nsi-ananmu ‘wo’
agyina ho, wo saa nkyereasee yi mu ama dwumadie biara a enni syofoo.

DODOD KABEA: Asante kasa mu dee, nnooma pii wo ho a yenni ne dodoo
kabea, te se onipa ho akwaa ahoroo ne esoro abodee ahoroo no. Se wope se
wokyere se eye dodoo a gyese wotwere dodoo a eye no toa so; se ebi a nsa
mmienw’ ani mmienu’. Yetumi nso de kasafua ‘ahoroo’ hye n’akyi de kyere se
edooso.

ASANTE ATWERD: €nam se Kur’aan Kronkron no ye nwoma a ekyerekyere
dee eye ne dee ennye pii mu nti, yede ‘n’ baako agyina ho ama dce eye anaase dee
eWwo Se yeyo, na yede ‘n’ mmienu nso agyina ho ama dee ennye anaase enni se
yeyo. Mfatoho bi ne se: ‘di’ (nipa baako) anka ewo se ne dodoo kabea ye ‘monn’
nanso enamse okenkanfoo bi besusu se woabra ne die nti, yeatwere ne dodoo kabea
no se ‘moni’. Baabiara a ‘n’ mmienu beba no ekyere se woabra ne yo. Saa ara na
‘m’ ne ‘mm’ nso tee.

CemDEE CWO MU

AL-HAGY
(Madina Yikyere)

1. Allah, Ddomfos, Mmoborshunutos
no din mu.

2. O Adasamma monsuro mo
Awurade, esi pi se, Donhwere no a
woahye ato hd no Asaase wosod no, ye

tobronsa wd abcre a wammoroo nsa,

paa.

4. Na nnipa no mu bi wo ho a wogye
akyinnye fa Allah ho ws abere a nimdee
nn a ho, na wodi domyofoo satan biara
akyi.

gne no befa adamfo3 no, sbeyera no na
wakyere no kwan ako Egya no asotwe
no mu.

mo nnaa fa Owusoree no ho a, ennee,

no din mu.

nnipa firi Allah kwan so no - Oma won
nnwuma ye kwa.

nnwuma pa, na wogye yikyere a woa-
sane ama Muhammad die no - na eno ne
nokore no a efiri won Awurade ho -
Obeyi won abrabo bone no afiri hs na
Wasakra won yobea.

akosdi nkontompo akyi wo abere a
nkurofos a woagye adie no di nokore a
efiri won Awurade ho no akyi. Sei na
Allah ye won mfatoho ma nnipa.

atiafod no wo esa mu, akono a momobs
won kon; na se modi won so a,
monkyeckyere mpokyere no mia mu -
afei, eno akyi, monsane won mfa won ho
nkye won se adom keke anaase monye
won aboadee bi - nkopem se esa no de
n’adesoa beto hs. Eno ne ahyedee no.

wo ebinom nsa ase. Na nkurofoo a
woakum won wd Allah kwan so no -
mma won nnwuma nnye kwa da.

won tebea.

fe na Waye no dansowa ama won no mu.

ascee ne won kyefa; na ODbema won
nnwuma aye kwa.

AL-AN’AAM
(Mekka Yikyere)

1. Allah, Ddomfos, Mmoborshunufos
no din mu.

2. Ayevie nyinaa wd Allah, Nea Db9o
esoro ahorod no ne asaase no, na maa
esum ahoroo ne hann baee; nanso
wonom a wonnye nnie no de nsesod
bata won Awurade no ho.

3. Ono ne Nea Wabod mo afiri dotee mu,
na afei Wahye mmere ato biribiara
so. Na bere fofors bi nso wo Ne nkyen.
Nanso mo adwene mu ye mo nnaa.

4. Na Ono ne Allah, Onyankopon no a
wo esoro ahoros no mu ene asaase no
mu. Onim mo asumasem, ne dee eda
adi wd mo ho. Na Jnim dee monya
nyinaa.

5. Na Nsenkyerennee biara mmfiri
won Awurade Nsenkyerennee ahorod
no mu mma won nkyen gyese wodane
won ho firi ho.

6. Enti wopoo nokore no bere a ebaa
won hd no; nanso ennkye biara na dee

AL-MUGYAADALAH
(Madina Yikyere)

1. Allah, Ddomfos, Mmoborshunufos
no din mu.
Nkyemu 28

2. Esi pi se Allah ate sbaa no asenka,
nea ane wo di ano-yiyie fa ne kunu ho,
na dde n’abooboodie to Allah anim no.
Na Allah ate mo nkymmodie no. Ampa
ara se Allah ye Dsentiefoo a Ohunu adee
nyinaa.

3. Mo mu nkurofod a woko won ho firi
won yerenom ho enamse wanom ankasa
hye fre won maame no - wonom
mmeye won maamenom; wonom maa-
menom nkoaa ne wonom a wowoo won.
Na esi pi se nsem a eye bone a eda adie
ne nkontompo na woka; nanso esi pi se
Allah na Opopa bone firi ho, na Oye
Bonefakyefoo paa.

4. Nkurofod no a wofre won yerenom
maamenom na afei wasan won ho akyi
firi dee woaka ho no asotwe a ews ho ma
won ne se wobegyae ddonkoni bi ama
wade ne ho ansaana wode won ho aka
won ho. Wei ne dee wade atu mo fo. Na
Allah nim dee moys no yie na Obebs mo
eho amannce.

5. Nanso obiara a wannya bi no obeys
akomkyene bosome mmienu a etoatoa
sod ansaana wode won ho aka won ho.
Na obiara a wanntumi annyd saa no,
€wo se abd ahiafoo aduosia akonhoma.
Wei te saa sedee ebeye na mobegye
Allah ne Ne Somafos no adi nokore mu.
Na wei ne ahyee no a Allah ahyehye ato
ha; na asotwe a eye ya wo ho ma atiafoos
no.

6. Nkurofos a wosore tia Allah ne Ne
Somafos no, esi pi se wobegu won
anim ase, mpo, te se dee woguu nkurd-
fod a wodii won anim kan no anim ase
no; na Yeasane Nsenkyerennee ahoros
a eda adi dada. Na atiafoo no benya
animguasce asotwe.
